activities.name: Word Wizard
activities.instructions: Pick a color. Now think of as many things as you can that are that color! Say them out loud. Can you get to 10? You are a word wizard!

activities.name: Number Crunch
activities.instructions: Start at the number 30 and count backwards by 2. Ready? 30, 28, 26... keep going! If you get to zero, try starting at 50. Your brain is a number machine!

activities.name: Story Time
activities.instructions: Make up a silly story! Start with 'Once upon a time, a penguin found a...' and keep going. Make it as funny as you can. Tell it out loud or in your head!

activities.name: Rhyme Time
activities.instructions: Pick a word like 'cat.' Now think of as many words that rhyme with it as you can! Hat, bat, mat, sat... When you run out, pick a new word. Go go go!

activities.name: Puzzle Power
activities.instructions: Look around the room. Find 5 things that are square. Now find 5 things that are round. Can you find something shaped like a triangle? You have eagle eyes!

activities.name: Memory Match
activities.instructions: Look around you for 10 seconds. Now close your eyes. Try to name every single thing you saw! Open your eyes and check. How many did you get? Try again!

activities.name: Tongue Twister
activities.instructions: Try to say this 5 times fast: 'Red lorry, yellow lorry!' Now try 'She sells seashells by the seashore.' Can you make up your own tongue twister? So fun!

activities.name: What If?
activities.instructions: Use your imagination! What if you could fly? Where would you go? What if animals could talk? What would your pet say? Think of 3 fun 'what ifs' and answer them!
